short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies the HTML of the currently selected elements when you right-click and select the option.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily copy the HTML of selected elements with this handy extension. Right-click to choose between copying HTML with or without class attributes, perfect for web developers and designers looking to streamline their workflow.
